code: @Override public void onApplicationEvent(ApplicationEvent event) {     if (logger.isDebugEnabled()) {         if (event instanceof ApplicationEnvironmentPreparedEvent) {             logger.debug("Application started with classpath: " + getClasspath()).         } else if (event instanceof ApplicationFailedEvent) {             logger.debug("Application failed to start with classpath: " + getClasspath()).         }     } }

@Override public boolean supportsEventType(ResolvableType resolvableType) {     Class<?> type = resolvableType.getRawClass().     if (type == null) {         return false.     }     return ApplicationEnvironmentPreparedEvent.class.isAssignableFrom(type) || ApplicationFailedEvent.class.isAssignableFrom(type). }

private String getClasspath() {     ClassLoader classLoader = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().     if (classLoader instanceof URLClassLoader) {         return Arrays.toString(((URLClassLoader) classLoader).getURLs()).     }     return "unknown". }
